name: rewire [GMTK Jam 2021]
description:
Rewire is a fast-paced puzzle game where you have to reconnect and disconnect parts of the circuit board to transfer data. 

Developed by two people for the GMTK Jam 2021 around the theme: Joined Together.

Controls: Click on the switches to change the data path.

-----------------------------------------------------

  • Art and code were made by the team.
  • Sounds and music from freesound.org.
